SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Applicant
Represents an Applicant who can apply for a housing project.
ApplicantUI
Handles the interactive user interface for an Applicant user.
AuthController
Controls authentication-related logic such as login and password changes.
AuthControllerTest
 
DataManager
Manages application-wide data including reading and writing of users, projects, and inquiries from/to CSV files.
HDBManager
Represents an HDB Manager, a user responsible for creating and managing BTO projects.
HDBManagerUI
The HDBManagerUI class represents the command-line interface for HDBManager users in the BTO Management System.
HDBOfficer
Represents an HDB Officer who is also an applicant, but with the additional ability to register and manage a project.
HDBOfficerUI
The HDBOfficerUI class provides a console-based user interface for HDBOfficer users within the BTO Management System.
Inquiry
Represents an inquiry submitted by an applicant regarding a BTO project.
InquiryController
Controls logic related to inquiries in the system.
LoginMenu
The LoginMenu class handles user authentication and redirection to appropriate role-based menus within the BTO Management System.
Main
Entry point for the BTO Application and Management System.
Project
Represents a BTO project that contains flat types, pricing, officer assignment, availability status, and application time window.
ProjectController
Handles project-related logic such as filtering, creation, application, booking, and modification of BTO projects for applicants, officers, and managers.
User
Abstract representation of a user in the BTO system.
